review: Dr Ravi has been our twins’ paediatrician since day one. Truly appreciate all the care he has provided our children right from their two month long stay in nicu last year till date. Thoroughly professional, polite and quite approachable, he patiently listens and clarifies all our doubts. Our experience with him so far has been extremely good.

Dr. Ravi Swamy was assigned to be my sons neonatologist at the time of his birth in manipal hospital itpl,bangalore. Been his doctor since. He is very professional and patient. He is very good at responding to all your quiers with atmost patience. i would recommend him for all my friends and family

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very prompt and friendly doctors!  Would always recommend him. No negative points found yet. Happy to have him here during pandemic times.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doc. Ravi is very caring and explains everything in a very good way.Went to meet him for baby jaundice increase and the case was handled very well by ravi sir.Thanks

My son has born with cleft palate and from the date  he born to today we take every decision after asking him. He took care and guide us for our baby. I’d highly recommend him for any normal babies as well as special babies.
